overview: Sexy Miss Carmen (Elle Rio) has the hottest job in town. . . reading the torrid mail to Lovers Magazine. Her first steamy note takes place in a harem, where Tom Byron gets an Arabian princess Feline to drop her veil. . . and everything else! Carmen shares more carnal correspondence with us. . . including a lesbian lickfest, a frantic three-way, and more! ! This Latin sex-bomb gets so turned on, two stiff studs quench her burning desires in a fiery, lust-drenched finale.
title: Lust Letters
